Loading libraries
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2021-07-13')
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2021, week = 29)

scoobydoo <- tuesdata$scoobydoo


if(!dir.exists("data")){
  dir.create("data")
}


if(!file.exists(here("data", "scoobydoo.RDS"))){
  saveRDS(scoobydoo, file=here("data","scoobydoo.RDS"))
}

```
